main_component.description: Immerse yourself in the world of code and sports at an exciting programming tournament with ItStep Academy. Create your own team of rugby players, write smart code to control the game and show your skills to your opponents!
main_component.footer: At ItStep Academy we create a unique, hands-on approach to learning that combines technology, sports and games in the most exciting combination.

registration_component.name: First name
registration_component.third_parties: We will never share your data with third parties
